_source.text: Admittedly, DVD sales rarely determine whether or not a show gets cancelled before its time (if only Firefly could have come out on disc when it was still on the air, maybe it never would have been canned), but it's better than nothing-my money does at least go back to the people and organizations that had a hand in the stuff I like, and I don't have to endure the visual and aural equivalent of assault and battery.

text: canned), but it's **better** **than** nothing-my money does at least go back to the people and organizations
that had a hand in the stuff I like, and I don't have to endure the visual and aural equivalent of **assault** and **battery**.
